name: Biddees
overview:
Biddees is a company that offers brand-name prepaid cards sold in an auction-style bidding process, ,while donating extra money to non-profits

With every Little Biddee Thingâ„¢ purchased, a nonprofit organization of your choice gets a donation to help them achieve their mission.

Founded in 2009 in Los Angeles, Biddees is the brainchild of successful entrepreneur Barry Shore, who was driven to create a business that would not only save people money, but also provide a new donation stream for nonprofit organizations. Our management team includes former executives from Shoes.com and The Walking Company, along with a technology team who built the engine that powers eHarmonyâ€™s complex matching system.
